General.Name: Kenadyr Mining Corp
General.Description: Kenadyr Metals Corp., a natural resource company, engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties. The company explores for gold. It holds 100% interest in the Borubai project that covers an area of 164 square kilometers located in the Chuy Region, the Kyrgyz Republic. The company was formerly known as Kenadyr Mining (Holdings) Corp. and changed its name to Kenadyr Metals Corp. in August 2021. Kenadyr Metals Corp. was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2C6

1.Name: Mr. Kevin  Ma C.A., CPA, CA, CPA
